informalexample.programlisting: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <KeyContainer Version="1.0" xmlns="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:keyprov:pskc"> <KeyPackage> <DeviceInfo> <Manufacturer>Manufacturer</Manufacturer> <SerialNo>987654321</SerialNo> </DeviceInfo> <Key Id="12345678" Algorithm="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:keyprov:pskc:hotp"> <AlgorithmParameters> <ResponseFormat Length="8" Encoding="DECIMAL"/> </AlgorithmParameters> <Data> <Secret> <PlainValue>MTIzNDU2Nzg5MDEyMzQ1Njc4OTA= </PlainValue> </Secret> <Counter> <PlainValue>0</PlainValue> </Counter> </Data> </Key> </KeyPackage> </KeyContainer>
